General.Name: Sichuan Zigong Conveying Machine Group Co Ltd
General.Description: Sichuan Zigong Conveying Machine Group Co., Ltd. designs and manufactures conveying machinery for material handling solutions in China. Its products include belt, pipe, screw, chain, and curve belt conveyors; drive and holdback units; bucket elevators; gearboxes; and backstops, etc. The company's products are used in various fields covering electricity, steel, coal, transportation, water conservancy, chemicals, metallurgy, petroleum, building material, etc. It exports its products to India, Nigeria, Senegal, Pakistan, Indonesia, Laos, Vietnam, Malaysia, the United States, Mali, Myanmar, and internationally. The company was founded in 2003 and is based in Zigong, China.
